Tina Williams Brewer bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà akụkọ gbasara akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Africa America. A mụrụ Brewer na Huntington, West Virginia. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbus College of Art and Design Brewer malitere na ime ime ụlọ na ite ite, mana ọ kwagara na akwa akwa na 1986, na-eche na ọ dakọtara na nne. Ọ nọ ugbu a na Pittsburgh, PA ma rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ nke Associated Artists of Pittsburgh na Pittsburgh Filmmakers / Pittsburgh Center for the Arts.

Brewers na-akpa ihe nnọchianya n'ime ọrụ ya iji kọọ akụkọ na-elekwasị ányà n'ihe gbásárá ezinụlọ, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, na ime mmụọ nke ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, na ahụmịhe onwe ya metụtara ha. Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya ndị okenye lekwasịrị anya na Middle Passage na ndị nna nna ya rutere America na ụgbọ mmiri ohu, mana ọ na-elekwasịkwa anya na onyinye ndị Africa America nyere na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọha mmadụ, dị ka Jazz.
Brewer bi na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania na di ya, John Brewer
O nwèrè ụmụ abụọ, John Emery na Kristine, na ụmụ ụmụ anọ.
Egwú na-agbagharị agbagharị na ụda na-amaghị ama
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihe karịrị ebe 50 dị mkpa na United States, ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere:
